name: Cloud Breaker (itch)
description:
-- best played on PC browser! (mobile works too though not so super) --
This is a classical breakout game: you need to hit the ball with a Boeing 747 and smash the funny clouds. The game has 6 levels; after that it's over.
Gameplay: Use the mouse (or touch input) to control the airplane to left or right.

I'm a complete beginner. This is my first game with Unity and C# after having a tutorial.
Have fun and enjoy.
